text: Banatski Monoštor (Serbian Cyrillic: Банатски Моноштор; Hungarian: Kanizsamonostor) is a village in Serbia. It is situated in the Čoka municipality, in the North Banat District, Vojvodina province. The village has a Hungarian ethnic majority (94.81%) and its population numbering 135 people (2002 census). ==See also== *List of places in Serbia *List of cities, towns and villages in Vojvodina Category:Populated places in Serbian Banat Category:Čoka
title: Banatski Monoštor
